ReefPartitionUniversal 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
    • Partitioning a generic reef

Package index

All functions

clustered_pixels_to_polygons()
Convert pixels for an entire reef that have been allocated site IDs into site polygons.
cluster_reef_pixels()
Cluster pixels into sites based on geographical attributes and additional extracted pixel values.
constrained_hclust()
Cluster pixels together using the adespatial::constr.hclust algorithm.
constrained_hclust_mst()
Default habitat clustering function using adespatial::constr.hclust.
extract_pixel_points()
Extract pixel data from selected habitats over a target reef.
hex_to_polygons()
Helper function to convert pixels in a single site into an sf poylgon.
neighborsDataFrame()
Helper function taken from package expp on 2025-01-20 that converts an spdep::nb neighbors object into a dataframe with columns id and id_neigh. Function copied from expp package to avoid expp dependency as this package is no longer maintained.
prepare_knn_edges()
Create k-nearest-neighbour edges for clustering inputs.
prepare_mst()
Create a minimum spanning tree from geographic coordinates of pixels and extracted data.
prepare_tri_edges()
Create triangulated edges from geographic coordinates of pixels.
reef_skater()
Cluster pixels together using the spdep::skater algorithm.
site_postprocessing()
Perform post-processing steps on site polygons.

Developed by First Last.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
